title: palukavadEmirA
sahitya:
palukavadEmirA nAtO rAma palikitE nIdEmi sommulu pOvuna


anupallavi

  jalaja sambhava jamara vinuta pada jalaja nayana nIvu sumukhuDai vEgamE


caraNam    niravadhi sukha dAyakuDani telisina nE niratamu nijamuga nammiyuNDagA
maracitivEmO maruvakurA rAma garuDa gamana vAsudEva dayAnidhE
